original_text: And a cubit on the one side, and a cubit on the other side of that which remaineth in the length of the curtains of the tent, it shall hang over the sides of the tabernacle on this side and on that side, to cover it.
korean_text: 막 곧 휘장의 길이의 남은 것은 이쪽에 한 규빗, 저쪽에 한 규빗씩 성막 좌우 양쪽에 덮어 늘어뜨리고

sentences.original_text: And a cubit on the one side
and a cubit on the other side
of that which remaineth in the length of the curtains of the tent
it shall hang over the sides of the tabernacle
on this side and on that side
